name: Akamai Technologies, Inc.
bossPosition: Vice President and Deputy General Counsel
goal: As a global leader in Content Delivery Network (CDN) services, Akamai makes the Internet fast, reliable and secure for its customers. Our advanced web performance, mobile performance, cloud security and media delivery solutions are revolutionizing how businesses optimize consumer, enterprise and entertainment experiences for any device, anywhere.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Akamai currently follows policy initiatives such as the Digital Single Market, NIS Directive, and the General Data Protection Regulation.
